org.apache.mina.common.support

Class IoFilterLifeCycleManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mina.common.support.IoFilterLifeCycleManager

  • public class IoFilterLifeCycleManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the life cycle of IoFilters globally.
    Version:
    $Rev: 350148 $, $Date: 2005-12-01 13:13:18 +0900 $
    Author:
    The Apache Directory Project (dev@directory.apache.org)
